select distinct cs.co_studyId as 'co_studyId', cs.co_email as 'co_email', cs.co_title as 'co_title', cs.co_location as 'co_location', cs.co_content as 'co_content', cs.co_mainImg as 'co_mainImg', cs.co_process as 'co_process', DATEDIFF(cs.co_deadLine, now()) as 'co_deadLine', IF(chs.status is null, false, chs.status) as 'co_heart', clp.co_languages as 'co_languages', cps.co_part as 'co_part', cps.co_limit as 'co_limit', cs.createdAt as 'createdAt', cs.updatedAt as 'updatedAt', cs.status as 'status' from CoStudy as cs left join CoHeartOfStudy as chs on cs.co_studyId = chs.co_studyId and chs.co_email = #{co_email} left join CoPartOfStudy as cps on cs.co_studyId = cps.co_studyId left join CoPartOfStudy as cps on cs.co_studyId = cps.co_studyId left join (select co_studyId, GROUP_CONCAT(cl.co_logo SEPARATOR ',') as co_languages from CoLanguageOfStudy as clo join CoLanguage as cl on clo.co_languageId = cl.co_languageId group by co_studyId) as cls on cs.co_studyId = cls.co_studyId where
cs.co_location = #{cs_locationTag} and
cps.co_part like #{co_partTag} and
(cs.co_title like #{co_keyword} or cs.co_content like #{co_keyword}) and
cs.co_process = #{co_processTag} and
cp.status = true order by cp.createdAt;
